name: Back In A Minute
description:
A project from two french students who decided to create a physic-based game in their free time for the Brackeys Game Jam.
The goal is simple: Destroy as many things as you can.

It's still in development.

We did fix a major bug at 12:04 am which made your score increased no matter what. It's not in the actual release, which is kinda sad :(
